item.title: [Showoff] Rocking Horse(Needs Anim)[Showoff]
item.dc:creator: @qadh qadh
item.description:
@qadh wrote:

I used polys and just set the properties so it had those lines rofl, and yeah when i get time im going to add detail like beveled edges, eyes, a proper nose and better rounded rockers. but till then thats whats there.

Read full topic

item.title: [Showoff] Rocking Horse(Needs Anim)[Showoff]
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch2 Java Is My Bitch
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch2 wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:16, topic:336799”][quote author=Java Is My Bitch link=topic=433215.msg3181681#msg3181681 date=1271369370]

[quote author=reyx7 link=topic=433215.msg3181664#msg3181664 date=1271368681]

[quote author=Java Is My Bitch link=topic=433215.msg3181660#msg3181660 date=1271368562]

Overdid the poly amount a bit. Go to the middle and delete some faces.
[/quote]Get over it. He did a good job.

Nty. This is a place for constructive criticism. I’m telling him how to perfect his models.
[/quote]Alot of polys isn’t exactly a bad thing. Even though it may be good for games to have low poly models doesn’t mean that you HAVE to make it low poly.

The goal is to have no useless polys sitting around. You want a clean structure and wireframe.
He could probably cut the poly limit in half if he restarted.
[/quote]I think instead of having him start over he should use all those extra polys to make it more detailed. You feel me?

From what I’m looking at, those extra polys won’t do shit. 90% of them are uneeded. Why is every line have another one next to it?[/quote]Don’t ask me that’s the first thing i though was weird. But I meant like you can move the lines to where you want them and change the size etc.

Read full topic

item.title: [Showoff] Rocking Horse(Needs Anim)[Showoff]
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

[quote=“Java Is My Bitch, post:15, topic:336799”][quote author=reyx7 link=topic=433215.msg3181664#msg3181664 date=1271368681]

[quote author=Java Is My Bitch link=topic=433215.msg3181660#msg3181660 date=1271368562]

[quote author=reyx7 link=topic=433215.msg3180980#msg3180980 date=1271295032]

Overdid the poly amount a bit. Go to the middle and delete some faces.
[/quote]Get over it. He did a good job.

Nty. This is a place for constructive criticism. I’m telling him how to perfect his models.
[/quote]Alot of polys isn’t exactly a bad thing. Even though it may be good for games to have low poly models doesn’t mean that you HAVE to make it low poly.

The goal is to have no useless polys sitting around. You want a clean structure and wireframe.
He could probably cut the poly limit in half if he restarted.
[/quote]I think instead of having him start over he should use all those extra polys to make it more detailed. You feel me?[/quote]
From what I’m looking at, those extra polys won’t do shit. 90% of them are uneeded. Why is every line have another one next to it?

Read full topic

item.title: [Showoff] Rocking Horse(Needs Anim)[Showoff]
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch2 Java Is My Bitch
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch2 wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:14, topic:336799”][quote author=Java Is My Bitch link=topic=433215.msg3181660#msg3181660 date=1271368562]

[quote author=reyx7 link=topic=433215.msg3180980#msg3180980 date=1271295032]

Overdid the poly amount a bit. Go to the middle and delete some faces.
[/quote]Get over it. He did a good job.

Nty. This is a place for constructive criticism. I’m telling him how to perfect his models.
[/quote]Alot of polys isn’t exactly a bad thing. Even though it may be good for games to have low poly models doesn’t mean that you HAVE to make it low poly.

The goal is to have no useless polys sitting around. You want a clean structure and wireframe.
He could probably cut the poly limit in half if he restarted.[/quote]I think instead of having him start over he should use all those extra polys to make it more detailed. You feel me?

Read full topic

item.title: [Showoff] Rocking Horse(Needs Anim)[Showoff]
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

[quote=“Java Is My Bitch, post:13, topic:336799”][quote author=reyx7 link=topic=433215.msg3180980#msg3180980 date=1271295032]

[quote author=Java Is My Bitch link=topic=433215.msg3180806#msg3180806 date=1271284634]

Overdid the poly amount a bit. Go to the middle and delete some faces.
[/quote]Get over it. He did a good job.

Nty. This is a place for constructive criticism. I’m telling him how to perfect his models.
[/quote]Alot of polys isn’t exactly a bad thing. Even though it may be good for games to have low poly models doesn’t mean that you HAVE to make it low poly.[/quote]
The goal is to have no useless polys sitting around. You want a clean structure and wireframe.
He could probably cut the poly limit in half if he restarted.

Read full topic

Oh my. Oh my. You can do that in ALOT lower.
Use the knife tool to shape, it can allow you to use minimum faces.
